__e: I came all the way here for one person only!
As a matter of fact, I'm where I am today because of you.
Molly, for her sake I've become a hero, but my great deeds mean nothing to her.

Although the fact that my mother is in seventh heaven about her, I keep trying to tell myself isn't a factor, but...
Everyone's here because of you, so it is my goddamn business.

He has troops who were due to be relieved weeks ago, and I have troops waiting for Ordnance to supply them with eyebrow tweezers while our political masters keep changing their minds whether to send them up the line or ship them to Salonika or Mesopotamia or Timbuktu!
